full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI LAS BYANG DBANG CHEN DGYES PA'I ROL GAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(RTA MGRIN SKYER SGANG LUGS 'DI SNYE MO ZHU YAS 'DIR YAN NA'ANG, LAS BYANG SNGA 'GYUR GTZANG MA ZHIG CHER MI 'DUG PA DANG, GTER GZHUNG DNGOS CHA TSANG YANG DKON PAS, BLA MA'I NGAG DANG RATNA GLING BA'I GSANG 'DUS NAS BRGYAN TE, TSOGS MCHOD BZHIN BSGRUB PA'I DRUNG YIG NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS DANG, SNGAGS BAN BLO BZANG DON 'GRUB GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR LA SLAR MA DAG PA RNAMS BCOS TE, ZA HOR GYI BTZUN PA BZHAD PA RTZAL GYIS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU SBYAR,, ,,)
